news.title: 希拉里怒斥特朗普掩盖
希拉里指控特朗普政府掩盖爱泼斯坦文件
news.title0: Hillary Clinton accuses Trump administration of Epstein files 'cover-up' in BBC interview
news.content: 希拉里·克林顿指责特朗普政府在处理已故性犯罪者杰弗里·爱泼斯坦相关文件时存在“掩盖”行为。
news.content0: Hillary Clinton has accused US President Donald Trump's administration of a "cover-up" over its handling of files related to the late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美参议员凯利称将“认真考虑”竞选总统
news.title0: US Senator Mark Kelly tells BBC he will 'seriously consider' White House run
news.content: 美国民主党参议员马克·凯利表示，他将“认真考虑”在2028年竞选总统。
news.content0: US Democratic Senator Mark Kelly has said he will "seriously consider" running for president in 2028 as he battles the Trump administration over a video in which he urged military personnel to refuse illegal orders.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 暗网调查员凭砖墙线索救出受害女孩
news.title0: How dark web agent spotted bedroom wall clue to rescue girl from years of harm
news.content: 调查员通过分析照片中卧室砖墙的独特类型，最终定位并解救了一名长期遭受性虐待的女孩。
news.content0: Warning: This article contains details about sexual abuse
news.author: BBC

news.title: 冬奥冰壶作弊丑闻令加拿大人不安
news.title0: 'A sad day' - curling cheating row at Winter Games unsettles Canadians
news.content: 冬奥会冰壶比赛中，加拿大选手被指控“二次触石”作弊，引发争议并损害了国家形象。
news.content0: A scandal at the Winter Olympics has left the Canadian curling teams on the defensive and Canadians reeling over the crack in their country's polite persona.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 约克公爵夫人六家公司进入清算程序
news.title0: Six of Sarah Ferguson's companies winding down
news.content: 与约克公爵夫人莎拉·弗格森相关的六家公司正被注销，文件显示这些公司已无商业活动。
news.content0: Six companies linked to the former Duchess of York, Sarah Ferguson, are being wound down, documents filed with Companies House show.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 乌克兰为士兵免费冷冻精子应对人口危机
news.title0: Facing a demographic catastrophe, Ukraine is paying for troops to freeze their sperm
news.content: 为应对战争导致的人口危机，乌克兰政府资助前线士兵冷冻精子，以便阵亡后伴侣仍能生育。
news.content0: Maxim doesn't mind discussing his sperm. In fact, he wishes more in Ukraine's military would talk about their fertility – or at least think about it.
news.author: BBC

news.title: FBI被指拒绝配合州级枪击案调查
news.title0: FBI won't co-operate on Alex Pretti investigation, state officials say
news.content: 美国明尼苏达州官员称，联邦调查局拒绝配合他们对一起移民执法抗议活动中护士被枪杀案的调查。
news.content0: Officials in the US state of Minnesota say the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) has refused to co-operate with their investigation into the death of Alex Pretti.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美国民权领袖杰西·杰克逊去世
news.title0: The Martin Luther King protege who helped reshape America
news.content: 美国民权运动标志性人物、两度竞选总统的杰西·杰克逊去世，享年84岁。
news.content0: Jesse Jackson, a key figure during the US civil rights movement of the 1960s,  was known for being the first African-American to make the jump from activism to major-party presidential politics.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 西班牙公寓火灾致五人死亡
news.title0: Five dead after fire at apartment building in Spain
news.content: 西班牙巴塞罗那附近一栋公寓楼发生火灾，造成至少五人死亡，五人受伤。
news.content0: Five people have died and at least five others have been injured in a fire at an apartment building in Spain.
news.author: Sky News
